Name: Fantasy Sino-Japanese War 幻想甲午
About the game: You unfortunately passed through the Sino-Japanese War, and became the Admiral of the North Sea Navy in the Qing Dynasty. What is more unfortunate is that this is not a history you are familiar with. This is an era when magic replaces machinery. Can you lead your army to achieve the final victory? This is an SRPG game. Currently, there is no content for novice guides, so it is only recommended for players with such game experience. From Weihai to Lushun, from China to North Korea, you will participate in the Sino-Japanese War of the Fantasy World. The end result also depends on your strength and choice.
